name: Monaco Mix by Rita Vitorelli and Harm van den Dorpel

metadata.name: Monaco Mix #1
metadata.description:
A full screen software piece, infinitely reconstructing the temporal development of a selection of touchpad drawings.

By Rita Vitorelli (drawings)   
and Harm van den Dorpel (programming), 2016.  

This Ethereum NFT version was programmed and deployed in 2018. A maximum of 100 tokens can be minted.   

The artists retain all copyrights of the assets referenced by this NFT.
